name: Insects take on Mars
description:
The modifications made to the game are:

1-  Created the 3rd level.

2- Changed the music for the main menu.

3- Added instructions'  button in the main menu GUI.

4- Added different music for the first and last level.

5- Edited the death effect of some enemies, noticeably like the last level there is a particular enemy you have to kill to get the key of the facility in order to win the level and the boos.

Created by: Areej
